title: Account Stolen
body:
Man, I'm trying to contact the support team to report that my account might have been stolen. Can't log in into it, and someone changed my summoner icon.
Somehow, this little coward gained access to my email account, can someone help me?

replies.body: Hey, don't worry we can help!  If you haven't already, fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will investigate this with you.  They'll be able to assist with recovery as well as look into any reparations that are needed.  Get tat sent to us and we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
I already did that, but no response was given. Still waiting and really nervous because I don't know what he's doing with my account.
Do you have a ticket number?  I can take a look at the account and do a security lock on it for you.

You might have been keylogged. 

I suggest running a scan on your computer to ensure you're clean of viruses. I also suggest getting two-step authentication w/your phone, so they cannot get through your email account.

Get as much protection as you can by doing all of this on a different computer until your own is clean from this. 

Keylogged is the only thing I can think of that got access to your email and league account.
Yes, I got the AV to use and found a couple viruses, already have my PC clean and changed my emails password, but my League account it's still robbed.

> [{quoted}](name=theBabyWolf,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=A3ErPiRq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-20T15:04:07.085+0000)
>
> Yes, I got the AV to use and found a couple viruses, already have my PC clean and changed my emails password, but my League account it's still robbed.

Hmm. This hacker isn't giving up on your account then. I suggest making a ticket to riot for more help. Assuming your hacker probably still has access to your account, I advise making a ticket under a different account of yours, to prevent the hacker from reading your ticket. If the hacker does NOT have access anymore, I'd still suggest making a ticket to Riot for help on further instructions on how to prevent the hacker from robbing your account. 

Link's here: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Click "Submit a Request" and choose the option best suitable to your issue here. Make sure to provide information that may prove that you're the original owner. (I know you are, but they need it) Make sure to provide ISP and date when you created the account, Card/Phone you may have used to buy RP on the account. Make sure to see if they can help you from keeping that hacker from continuing robbing your account.
Already did it with this account and with an email which wasn't attached to any Riot Account.

Alright. Hope for the best, bud! 

Good luck.
Wow. Now he deleted all my friends...
